ygData.subject: Re: I hate to be a downer... but..
ygData.msgSnippet: I disagree.. you mentioned this 50 charges to 1 charge thing is a plot by verant to make things only useful to their original owner.. but if you have gotten a
ygData.messageBody:
I disagree.. you mentioned this 50 charges to 1 charge thing is a plot by
verant to make things only useful to their original owner.. but if you have
gotten a observer staff recently the 50 to 1 charge thing no longer
exisist.. it WAS a bug!! And about the aqua lungs only being ment for
gnomes.. HIGHLY doubtful. Just ride it out guys.. quit making speculations
that can't be backed up. Its no use... just wait and see what happens.

----- Original Message -----
From: Talkum Talmaich <talkum_talmaich@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, November 05, 1999 1:27 PM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] I hate to be a downer... but..


> From: "Talkum Talmaich" <talkum_talmaich@...>
>

>
> Verrant has started a tradition now of making things useful to their
> original owner be it by making the item no-drop, or changing the charges
on
> an item when traded. As noted in previous mesaages, this is already in
place
> with items such as the Staff of Observers.
>
> Verrant is not likely aiming to replace the long lines for a fishbone
> earring with a tinkered item. It seems they are coming up with a variety
of
> ways for different classes to make the journey into Kedge. They merely
added
> a way for us tinkerers to journey there ourselves with the help of our on
> trade skill.
>
> I've been to Kedge Keep twice merely on enduring breath,
> Talkum Talmaich
>
> >
